text: The Fresh Vegetable Mystery is a 1939 Color Classics cartoon. It was released on September 29, 1939. ==Plot== It’s late at night in a kitchen, and all the vegetables are asleep, when a cloaked figure arrives and kidnaps mother carrot and her kids. ==References== Category:1939 animated films Category:1939 films Category:Short films directed by Dave Fleischer Category:Color Classics cartoons Category:Fruit and vegetable characters Category:1930s animated short films
title: The Fresh Vegetable Mystery
